means: (在竖琴上演奏的)拉格泰姆乐曲
低级夜总会(或酒吧等)的

entry.def: A honky-tonk is a cheap bar or nightclub.

example.ex: For several years, Bill Wirtz has been performing in small clubs and honky-tonks from Maryland to the Carolinas.
example.tran: 几年来，比尔·沃茨一直在马里兰州和南北卡罗来纳州之间的小型俱乐部和低级酒吧里表演。
得克萨斯州的低级小酒吧

entry.tran: （旧时在低级酒吧或夜总会里演奏的）钢琴乐曲，杭基汤克乐曲
entry.def: Honky-tonk is the kind of piano music that was formerly played in honky-tonks.

means.word_mean: 1. a cheap disreputable nightclub or dance hall
